title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, heat a large skillet over medium heat and cook pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, both cheeses, and black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta cooking water, then drain the pasta.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta and toss.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, half of garam masala, cumin, and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add remaining spices and cook for 30 seconds.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes until thick.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Fresh vegetables sautéed in a light soy-based sauce for a quick healthy meal.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add onion and garlic, stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add harder vegetables like carrots and broccoli first, cook for 2 minutes.
Add bell pepper and zucchini, continue stir-frying for 2-3 minutes.
Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch in a small bowl.
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
Cook for another 1-2 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve immediately over steamed rice.

title: Classic Ice Cream Sundae
summary: A delicious layered dessert with vanilla ice cream, chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry on top served in an elegant glass.
instructions: Chill the sundae glasses in the freezer for 10 minutes.
Place 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream in each chilled glass.
Drizzle chocolate sauce generously over the ice cream.
Add a layer of caramel sauce on top of the chocolate.
Top with a generous dollop of whipped cream.
Sprinkle chopped nuts over the whipped cream.
Place a maraschino cherry on top and insert a wafer cookie.
Serve immediately with long spoons.
